column4: Does anyone knows how to use X11VCN? they say I can't use it because I have a Firewall, but I do not remember installing one. How do you turn it off in Ubuntu 10.10?
; all linux's come with built in firewalls in general . allmost anyone . some weak some are stronger ;P
, i dont know :P that was the issue for mee to in the time for a ftp serving all the root-fs :P
